articles.title: Wayland schools investigating after Black student targeted in racist locker room incident

summary: Wayland schools are investigating a racist incident involving a Black student’s jersey.

articles.title: Furloughed federal workers face delays getting unemployment pay during shutdown
articles.description:

summary: About 26,000 federal workers filed unemployment claims between Sept. 28 and Oct. 18.
